guid.description: GUID for user in active directory

passwordLastUpdate.description: Time of account's password last update

complexityEnabled.description: Flag indicating if passwords should be forced to follow Microsoft's password guidelines

lockoutDuration.description: Account lock time (in minutes) when too much passwords have been tried

lockoutObservationWindow.description: Time (in minutes) before the password attempts counter is reset

lockoutThreshold.description: Maximum number of password tries before account locking

maxPasswordAge.description: Maximum lifespan of passwords, in days

minPasswordAge.description: Minimum lifespan of passwords, in days (0 = unlimited)

minPasswordLength.description: Minimum number of characters passwords must contain

name.description: Name of the Active Directory organizational unit

officeTenantServiceName.description: Service name of the office tenant (/licence/office/{serviceName}) linked to this AD service

state.description: Current state of the Active Directory organizational unit

msServices.ActiveDirectorySyncClientUrl.description: Temporary link to ADSync software executable

configured.description: Indicates if the account is configured

deleteOutlookAtExpiration.description: Delete Outlook license at expiration date

exchangeGuid.description: Property needed for mailbox manual configuration (GUID)

litigation.description: Litigation hold feature enabled on this mailbox

litigationPeriod.description: Litigation hold period in days (0 means unlimited). This setting covers all items in the mailbox.

mailingFilter.description: Enable or disable anti-virus and anti-spam

numberOfAliases.description: Count the number of related aliases attached to this account

quota.description: Maximum mailbox usage in GB (overall size)

spamDetected.description: Spam activity detected on this mailbox

taskPendingId.description: Pending task id for this account

maxReceiveSize.description: Maximum allowable size for received messages in MB

maxSendSize.description: Maximum allowable size of sent messages in MB

msServices.LicensePeriodEnum.description: Period of time used to determine license statistics

activated.description: Indicates if Multi Factor Authentication is activated on this account

state.description: Current status of Multi Factor Authentication feature

taskPendingId.description: Pending task for Multi Factor Authentication

msServices.SharepointAccountAccessRights.description: Account access rights to the service

accessRights.description: The rights assigned to the sharepoint account

configured.description: Indicates if the account is configured

taskPendingId.description: Pending task for this sharepoint account

quota.description: Shared space maximum size in byte

deleteSpam.description: If message is a spam delete it

deleteVirus.description: If message is a virus delete it

putInJunk.description: If message is a spam or virus put in junk. Overridden by deleteSpam or deleteVirus

tagSpam.description: If message is a spam change its subject

tagVirus.description: If message is a virus change its subject

license.description: the kind of license under which sync account is contracted

date.description: the date used to determine sync account license usage

configured.description: Indicates if the account is configured

taskPendingId.description: Pending task for this sync account

msServices.TaskFunctionEnum.description: function enumeration for Active Directory task

cnameToCheck.description: Cname record used for UPN suffix verification

service.RenewType.description: Map a possible renew for a specific service

deleteAtExpiration.description: The service will be deleted at expiration

forced.description: The service forced to be renewed

manualPayment.description: The service needs to be manually renewed and paid

service.RenewalTypeEnum.description: Detailed renewal type of a service

canDeleteAtExpiration.description: Indicates that the service can be set up to be deleted at expiration

possibleRenewPeriod.description: All the possible renew period of your service in month
